articles.description: “It took so many years to get ready, like a great bottle of wine, that when it finally hit, it was unstoppable,” producer John Lissauer told The Post.
articles.content: In 1984 the same year that Bruce Springsteen, Prince and Madonna ruled the pop charts with Born in the U.S.A., Purple Rain and Like a Virgin, respectively there was another classic that never saw the… [+5366 chars]

articles.title: GOP's Ted Cruz feuds with Elmo over kids getting COVID-19 vaccines - ABC News
articles.description: Republican Sen. Ted Cruz of Texas took aim at popular children's show character Elmo Tuesday after the Sesame Street puppet promoted COVID-19 vaccines for children.
articles.content:
Republican Sen. Ted Cruz of Texas took aim at Sesame Street's "Elmo" after the popular children's show puppet promoted COVID-19 vaccines for children on Twitter.

articles.title: ‘Mr. Malcolm’s List’ Review: A Finalist for His Affection - The New York Times
articles.description: Upper-crust courtship comes with undercooked social commentary in this Regency-era romance.
articles.content: A tepid Regency-era romance, Mr. Malcolms List hinges on Jeremy Malcolm (Sope Dirisu), a wealthy, aloof bachelor looking for a woman who meets his 10-point checklist for a suitable mate. The trouble … [+1241 chars]

articles.title: Tom Hiddleston Is Officially Having A Kid With MCU Villain - Inside the Magic
articles.description: Tom Hiddleston is having a baby with someone who will be playing a villain in an upcoming MCU movie arriving next year.
articles.content:
Tom Hiddleston will soon be a father, but fans might be surprised to learn that Hiddleston’s partner is going to be a villain in the MCU.
Credit: Marvel Studios
